name: Ed Harcourt
description: '''Edward Henry Richard Harcourt-Smith''' (born 14 August 1977) is an English singer-songwriter. To date, he has released ten studio albums, two [[extended play|EPs]], and thirteen [[single (music)|singles]]. His debut album, ''[[Here Be Monsters (Ed Harcourt album)|Here Be Monsters]]'', was nominated for the 2001 [[Mercury Prize]]. Since 2007 he has been writing for other artists, including [[Sophie Ellis-Bextor]] and [[Paloma Faith]], and has performed with [[Marianne Faithfull]] and [[the Libertines]]. His music is influenced by [[Tom Waits]], [[Nick Cave]], and [[Jeff Buckley]], among others.
